subtitleNullable: large multi-var time series of historical stock market price, volume, and more
descriptionNullable:
This dataset contains 3 files with historical US stock market data of varying lengths (1000, 3500, & 8000 market open days) in the past. To access these files, use the standard library 'pickle.load(file_path)' method. To find an example, you can reference my accompanying notebook. The market data files are 3d numpy arrays with the days as rows, columns, and 3rd axis is the various stocks. The larger 8000 row data has fewer stocks while the 1000 has the most. Most recent date is 2024-04-12.

There are accompanying mapping files if you want to analyze the stocks' time series by sector/industry or any other fundamental.

Retrieved from https://stooq.com/db/h/

**Columns**
0) stock name: str
1) date: int
~~-----~~
2) open: float
3) high: float
4) low: float
5) close: float
6) volume: float
7) change: float, (close - open)
8) range: float, (high - low)
~~-----~~
